What exact stats did I give ? Are you saying rape in our society isn't real? Because I know plenty of women who have been raped. I've walked them through lines at clinics to see a Dr while men and women threw things at them and called them whores outside. Hell, I've been one of those women. Perhaps we've met before. Coincidentally, I've also walked people through the same crowd who were going to get a mammogram, who also had things thrown at them. Trust me. I know what I'm talking about. So stop with the anecdotal bullshit, lady.
Yes I will.

I taught for 25 years and I refused to put any religious stuff up. I have taxpayer's children in the class. One school had 32 different languages and 63 different dialects. I could not assume that they were all religious or even christian. Prayers are done at home or church and education is done in a school. If a student wanted to pray they could close their eyes and think a really nice prayer with zero concerns. If you are one of those wild eyed christians...what would you do if I provided a place to put taxpayer's children muslim prayer rugs? Taxpayer funded schools are for education only.
